briefTitle: Vinorelbine Plus Capecitabine Versus Docetaxel Plus Capecitabine in Anthracycline-pretreated Women With Metastatic Breast Cancer
officialTitle: A Randomised Controlled Phase II Trial of Vinorelbine Plus Capecitabine Versus Docetaxel Plus Capecitabine in Anthracycline-pretreated Women With Metastatic Breast Cancer.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* female ≥ 18 years old ECOG 0-2

Exclusion Criteria:

* brain metastasis
